titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Lafayette Ely. It is ordered that government's exhibits in this case are to be returned to the United States Attorney for appropriate disposition. Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom.(CJP)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ely, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER REGARDING MOTION FOR SENTENCE REDUCTION PURSUANT TO 18:3582(c)(2) - granting 110 motion to reduce sentence pursuant to crack cocaine Amendment 706. Except as provided above, all provisions of the judgment dated 12/20/01 shall remain in effect. Effective date: 10/3/08 for Carlton Brown (2), Count(s) 1, Dft pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and was committed to the custody of the BOP for 118 months; 5 years SR w/special conditions and $100 SA as to Carlton Brown. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. ( KBJ)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 8:01-cr-00130; USA v. Ely, et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER REGARDING MOTION FOR SENTENCE REDUCTION PURSUANT TO 18:3582(c)(2) - granting 110 motion to reduce sentence pursuant to crack cocaine Amendment 706. Except as provided above, all provisions of the judgment dated 12/20/01 shall remain in effect. Effective date: 10/3/08 for Carlton Brown (2), Count(s) 1, Dft pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and was committed to the custody of the BOP for 118 months; 5 years SR w/special conditions and $100 SA as to Carlton Brown. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. ( KBJ)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ely, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER denying as moot 113 motion to reserve ruling - denying as moot 116 motion to reduce sentence pursuant to crack cocaine Amendment 706 as to Carlton Brown (2) as motion to reduce sentence 110 has been ruled on by the Court. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JDR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ely, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - The defendants supervised release is hereby revoked, and the defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of six (6) months, to be given credit for time served since December 24, 2009. Upon completion of the defendants incarceration, his supervised release will terminate as to defendant Lafayette Patrick Watson. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copies to USM)(MKR)ORDER - The defendants supervised release is hereby revoked, and the defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of six (6) months, to be given credit for time served since December 24, 2009. Upon completion of the defendants incarceration, his supervised release will terminate as to defendant Lafayette Patrick Watson. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copies to USM)(MKR)ORDER - The defendants supervised release is hereby revoked, and the defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of six (6) months, to be given credit for time served since December 24, 2009. Upon completion of the defendants incarceration, his supervised release will terminate as to defendant Lafayette Patrick Watson. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copies to USM)(MKR)
